name: Emerald | Mauveover | Coffe G6
bio: Ciao! Emerald | Mauveover | Coffe G6 here. I'm here to enjoy shakin' dat booty and hitting on yo' man. I once dreamed of being a Ventriloquist. Now I can be found volunteering at the local kitten rescue shelter all day. Purrhaps this is the beginning of a beautiful relationship.
